entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
